Uses of Class
org.jawin.ReturnFlags

Packages that use ReturnFlags
org.jawin The main Jawin classes.  
org.jawin.marshal Jawin stub classes to the native code - FIXME contains unused classes?.  
 

Uses of ReturnFlags in org.jawin
 

Fields in org.jawin declared as ReturnFlags
static ReturnFlags ReturnFlags.CHECK_NONE
          used when no checking of return values should be done in the native code.
static ReturnFlags ReturnFlags.CHECK_FALSE
          used when the native code should throw an exception if (!ret).
static ReturnFlags ReturnFlags.CHECK_HRESULT
          used when the native code should throw an exception if FAILED(hr).
static ReturnFlags ReturnFlags.CHECK_W32
          used when the native code should throw an exception if the return value is not ERROR_SUCCESS.
 

Methods in org.jawin with parameters of type ReturnFlags
 byte[] FuncPtr.invoke(java.lang.String instructions, int stackSize, int argStreamSize, byte[] argStream, java.lang.Object[] objectArgs, ReturnFlags flags)
          generic method for calling native methods that do not match any of the invoke_* methods.
 byte[] FuncPtr.invoke(java.lang.String instructions, int stackSize, NakedByteStream argStream, java.lang.Object[] objectArgs, ReturnFlags flags)
          shortcut method for calling FuncPtr.invoke(String, int, int, byte[], Object[], ReturnFlags) when using a NakedByteStream for building the argStream-bytes.
 int FuncPtr.invoke_I(ReturnFlags flags)
          for calling native methods taking no args, and returning an int.
 int FuncPtr.invoke_I(int arg0, ReturnFlags flags)
          for calling native methods taking one int arg, and returning an int.
 int FuncPtr.invoke_I(int arg0, int arg1, ReturnFlags flags)
          for calling native methods taking two int args, and returning an int.
 int FuncPtr.invoke_I(int arg0, int arg1, int arg2, int arg3, ReturnFlags flags)
          for calling native methods taking four int args, and returning an int.
 int FuncPtr.invoke_I(java.lang.String arg0, ReturnFlags flags)
          for calling native methods taking one String arg, and returning an int.
 int FuncPtr.invoke_I(java.lang.String arg0, java.lang.String arg1, ReturnFlags flags)
          for calling native methods taking two String args, and returning an int.
 int FuncPtr.invoke_I(int arg0, java.lang.String arg1, ReturnFlags flags)
          for calling native methods taking one int and one String args, and returning an int.
 int FuncPtr.invoke_I(int arg0, java.lang.String arg1, java.lang.String arg2, int arg3, ReturnFlags flags)
          for calling native methods taking one int, two String and one int args, and returning an int (used for MessageBoxW).
 int FuncPtr.invoke_I(byte[] arg0, ReturnFlags flags)
          for calling native methods taking one pointer to a byte array, and returning an int.
 int FuncPtr.invoke_OI(int arg0, ReturnFlags flags)
          for calling native methods taking two int args, where the last int is a [out] parameter.
 int FuncPtr.invoke_OI(int arg0, int arg1, int arg2, int arg3, ReturnFlags flags)
          for calling native methods taking five int args, where the first four are standard [in] parameters and the last int is a [out] parameter.
 int FuncPtr.invoke_OI(int arg0, java.lang.String arg1, ReturnFlags flags)
          for calling native methods taking one [in] int, one [in] String and one [out] int arg.
 byte[] FuncPtr.invoke_S(int arg0, int returnSize, ReturnFlags flags)
          for calling native methods taking one int arg, and returning a byte array of a specified size (typically used when calling methods returning a struct with a known byte-size).
 byte[] FuncPtr.invoke_S(byte[] arg0, int returnSize, ReturnFlags flags)
          for calling native methods taking one pointer to a byte array, and returning a byte array of a specified size.
 byte[] FuncPtr.invoke_S(byte[] arg0, int arg1, int returnSize, ReturnFlags flags)
          for calling native methods taking one pointer to a byte array and one int args, and returning a byte array of a specified size.
 

Uses of ReturnFlags in org.jawin.marshal
 

Methods in org.jawin.marshal with parameters of type ReturnFlags
static byte[] GenericStub.win32Invoke(int peer, java.lang.String instructions, int stackSize, int argStreamSize, byte[] argStream, java.lang.Object[] objectArgs, ReturnFlags flags)
          for calling a native method exposed in a DLL.
